1.name: Single Line Assault
1.desc: Your fleet has 15% increased Firepower and Torpedo, and 10% reduced Evasion.

2.name: Double Line Advance
2.desc: Your fleet Evasion has increased by 30%, while Firepower and Torpedo has reduced by 5%.

4.name: Emergency Repair
4.desc: Restore 10%  HP to all ships in your current fleet

91.name: Crisis Averted~
91.desc: Crisis Averted~Nobody is going to harass you this time

92.name: Nightfall
92.desc: Enemies will appear on Ambush tiles during nighttime.

8802.name: Secured Control
8802.desc: You've secured the Floating Fortress! During battle, allied aircraft will arrive to attack the enemies!

10.name: Unrestricted Support
10.desc: Submarine Support can be called in beyond the fleet's ASR boundaries.

12.name: Sonar Scan
12.desc: Requisition land-based anti-submarine support. Perform an anti-submarine scan of the entire map, marking any submerged submarines.

8744.name: Blessing of the Butterfly
8744.desc: When activated: Shinano fires 3 rounds of supporting fire and increases your fleet's FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0%.

8650.name: Searchlight
8650.desc: Under the effect of a searchlight.

8745.name: Blessing of the Butterfly
8745.desc: When activated: Shinano fires 3 rounds of supporting fire and increases your fleet's FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0%.

8746.name: Blessing of the Butterfly
8746.desc: When activated: Shinano fires 3 rounds of supporting fire and increases your fleet's FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0%.

8750.name: Searchlight
8750.desc: Under the effect of a searchlight.

10011.name: Air Supremacy
10011.desc: The DMG of your fleets' Airstrikes is increased by 20% and the DMG your fleets take from enemy aircraft is decreased by 10% (Flooding and Burn DMG are unaffected). Your fleets' Accuracy is increased by 10% and your Ambush encounter rate is decreased by 8%.

10013.name: Air Parity
10013.desc: The DMG of your fleets' Airstrikes is decreased by 6% and the DMG your fleets take from enemy aircraft is increased by 3% (Flooding and Burn DMG are unaffected).

10014.name: Air Denial
10014.desc: The DMG of your fleets' Airstrikes is decreased by 12% and the DMG your fleets take from enemy aircraft is increased by 6% (Flooding and Burn DMG are unaffected). Your fleets' Accuracy and EVA is decreased by 3%.

11.name: Positional Change
11.desc: Changes the Submarine Fleet's position on the map.

93.name: Daybreak
93.desc: Enemies won't appear on Ambush tiles during daytime.

9508.name: Endless Night
9508.desc: Darkness shrouds the battlefield, making it impossible to check the composition of enemy fleets before battle.

10015.name: Air Incapability
10015.desc: The DMG of your fleets' Airstrikes is decreased by 20% and the DMG your fleets take from enemy aircraft is increased by 10% (Flooding and Burn DMG are unaffected). Your fleets' Accuracy and EVA is decreased by 8%.

10012.name: Air Superiority
10012.desc: The DMG of your fleets' Airstrikes is increased by 12% and the DMG your fleets take from enemy aircraft is decreased by 6% (Flooding and Burn DMG are unaffected). Your fleets' Accuracy is increased by 5% and your Ambush encounter rate is decreased by 5%.

10021.name: Fever Mode
10021.desc: Your fleet is in Fever Mode, and will restore 2% Max HP at the beginning of battle.

9505.name: Iron Blood Aerial Support
9505.desc: Enemy Air Squads will appear on this stage, and your fleets will take 10% more damage from Airstrikes.

9502.name: Heavy Mist
9502.desc: An ominous mist surrounds the battlefield. The Accuracy of all your ships is decreased by 5%.

9500.name: Wisdom Cube Reactivity
9500.desc: Due to a highly reactive Wisdom Cube, the entire fleet's DMG increases by 20%, but their DMG taken also increases by 20%.

8732.name: Blessing of the Butterfly
8732.desc: When activated: Shinano fires 3 rounds of supporting fire and increases your fleet's FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0%.

8801.name: Control Lost
8801.desc: You've lost control of the Floating Fortress! During battle, enemy forces will be reinforced by additional aircraft!

90.name: RED ALERT!
90.desc: Kizuna AI is going to harass you during your next battle: Submarine Call, Air Strike, Torpedo Attack, and Main Battery Fire functions will be locked (including manual control mode). Tap her face a bunch to make her go away.

47.name: High-Efficiency Operation
47.desc:
Increases the Oil spent on this current stage by 100%;
In the process, increases the Commander EXP, Meowfficer EXP, and Ship EXP gained by 100%, and grants an additional drop chance. Mood consumption and Affection gain are both increased by 100%.
